quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of "adding a flying golden butterfly above the mirror", consider the impact on overall realism and natural appearance. The butterfly's placement and interaction with lighting should not introduce unnatural elements.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the golden butterfly appear naturally lit and integrated into the scene without disrupting the existing light sources?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Focusing on the material and texture of the added butterfly in relation to the surrounding environment, ensuring it does not introduce any unnatural textures while maintaining visual credibility.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the material and texture of the golden butterfly consistent with the surrounding surfaces, avoiding any visible unnatural textures?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Considering the structural consistency and absence of distortion in the butterfly's shape, ensuring it maintains geometric coherence relative to its position above the mirror.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the shape of the golden butterfly structurally coherent and free from distortion, maintaining proper geometry as it appears above the mirror?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Assessing the fine details of the butterfly, ensuring the editing process did not degrade them, and maintaining the high level of detail present in the original image.
quality_check_questions.question: Have the fine details of the golden butterfly been preserved, ensuring clarity and sharpness in comparison to the rest of the image?
